entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
